How to Get Voter Data in Oregon

November 17, 2025 oregon voter-data voter-list voter-history

Oregon provides access to voter registration data and voter history for $500 through an online request system. The state offers a straightforward process for obtaining comprehensive statewide voter information.

Quick Summary

Category Details
Statewide Cost $500
Voter List Access Online request form
Voter History Access Included with voter list
Delivery Method Contact SOS for delivery details
Processing Time After request approval and payment

Voter List

Oregon provides voter registration data through the Secretary of State’s Elections Division with an online request system.

How to Access

  1. Visit the Oregon Request for Voter List page
  2. Complete the online request form
  3. Submit the form for review
  4. Complete payment ($500)
  5. Receive voter data after processing

What’s Included

The voter registration file includes comprehensive information for all registered voters in Oregon.

Voter History

Oregon includes voter history data with the voter registration list.

Historical Coverage

Voter history records are provided along with the voter registration data. Contact the Secretary of State for details about the historical coverage period included in the voter history file.

Cost

Oregon charges $500 for statewide voter registration data with voter history.

Restrictions and Permitted Uses

When requesting Oregon voter data, users must comply with state laws regarding the use of voter registration records. The online request form will include specific terms of use and legal requirements that must be acknowledged during the request process.

Technical Notes

Online Request System

Oregon’s online request system provides a modern approach to purchasing voter data with:

  • Web-based request form
  • Electronic submission
  • Secure payment processing
  • Streamlined approval workflow

Delivery Method

Contact the Secretary of State’s office or review information provided after request approval for details about how data is delivered.

Testing Status

This system has not been independently tested. Contact the Oregon Secretary of State for current information about:

  • Processing timelines
  • Payment methods
  • Delivery methods
  • File formats
  • Data structure and documentation

Contact Information

Oregon Secretary of State - Elections Division

  • Website: https://sos.oregon.gov/elections/
  • Voter List Requests: Request for Voter List

Oregon’s online voter list request system offers straightforward access to statewide voter data with voter history for $500. The web-based request process and integrated payment system make it convenient to obtain comprehensive voter information for election-related and political purposes.
